fields.name: Abilties:
fields.value:
- On non-full moon nights, learn a target's role, if you find an Evil role, you will worship them.
- On full moon nights, sacrifice a player, this will deal a Basic attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will change your worship target if you learn the role of another evil player.
- You are only revealed to your target if you reach 3 sacrifices.
- For every player successfully sacrificed, boost your worship target:
> - 1: They will appear innocent to most investigations.
> - 2: The first time they would die, you will attempt to save them by giving powerful defense.
> - 3: They will secretly gain 1 extra vote anytime as a day ability.
